definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: It's, again, a parabola going downwards.
sentences.chinese: 它同样是，开口向下的一条抛物线。

sentences.english: From this one, you would not expect it to behave like a parabola.
sentences.chinese: 从这一次，你不会期待它，如抛物线般运动。

sentences.english: See, it's the same with a parabola going upwards.
sentences.chinese: 看，这跟一个开口向上的抛物线类似的。

sentences.english: Short parabolic profile. Four blades design.
sentences.chinese: 短抛物线外型，四刀翼设计。

sentences.english: By this way , the exact solutions of parabolic lossless nonuniform transmission line can be gained.
sentences.chinese: 用这种等效方法可以求解抛物线型非均匀线的精确解。

sentences.english: Helical, parabolic, and cubic interpolations are usually executed in a stored program algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋线，抛物线，立方插值通常作为存储程序的算法。

sentences.english: The movement tracks of these balls in space are different parabolas.
sentences.chinese: 这些球在空中的运动轨迹是不同的抛物线。

sentences.english: The formulas introduced for design of the parabolic mandrel and pass are worth referring to.
sentences.chinese: 引用的抛物线芯棒及孔型设计公式可供参考。

sentences.english: Results Obtained some linear combination identities involving Hermite polynomials and parabolic cylinder function.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究厄密多项式与抛物线柱函数线性组合的性质。

sentences.english: Upswept roofs and parabolas cropped up on buildings.
sentences.chinese: 建筑物采用了倾斜的抛物线屋顶。

sentences.english: The releasing characteristic of soil phosphorus can be exactly depicted by parabolic diffusion equation.
sentences.chinese: 抛物线扩散公式能很好地拟和土壤磷素释放特征。

sentences.english: So, we should draw maybe this downward parabola.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以画出这样的开口向下的抛物线。
这就是一个抛物线方程。

sentences.english: It's a parabola pointing downwards, and starting at one.
sentences.chinese: 那是起点在1且开口向下的抛物线。

sentences.english: Gaudí pioneered the parabolic arch, with its perfect distribution of load.
sentences.chinese: 高迪首创了抛物线拱，其载荷分布完美。

sentences.english: Short parabolic profile. Six blades design.
sentences.chinese: 短抛物线外型，六刀翼设计。

definition: directrix line of a parabola/guide line
axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
